漢羅台文: 有濟濟少年人堅心欲拍破過去國民黨政府殖民的真相、
台羅: ū tsē-tsē siàu-liân-lâng kian-sim beh phah-phuà kuè-khì Kok-bîn-tóng tsìng-hú si̍t-bîn ê tsin-siòng,
台羅數字調: u7 tse7-tse7 siau3-lian5-lang5 kian1-sim1 beh4 phah4-phua3 kue3-khi3 kok4-bin5-tong2 tsing3-hu2 sit8-bin5 e5 tsin1-siong3,
白話字: ū chē-chē siàu-liân-lâng kian-sim beh phah-phòa kòe-khì Kok-bîn-tóng chèng-hú si̍t-bîn ê chin-siòng,
